one-stop.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a one-stop shop, service etc provides a range of information, goods, or services that are usually only available from several different places
one-stop.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Some building societies are offering homebuyers a ‘one-stop’ service, including legal advice and insurance.
The new helpline has been set up as a ‘ one-stop shop’ for all travel enquiries.
